title: Yosuke Ideguchi signs four-year deal with Leeds
description: Leeds United have completed the signing of Japan international midfielder Yosuke Ideguchi from Gamba Osaka.
content: Sky Sports News reported last Thursday a deal had been agreed for the 21-year-old and the Championship side have now confirmed Ideguchi has signed a four-year-deal on an undisclosed fee.Ideguchi, capped 11 times by Japan, will be loaned out to Spanish Segunda Division side Cultural Leonesa until the end of the season.The midfielder, with two international goals to his name, could feature for his country at this summer's World Cup in Russia.He becomes Leeds' second signing of the January transfer window, following the capture of defender Aapo Halme from Finnish side HJK Helsinki.
